item.description:
Come join us at Abeille to kickoff “A-MUSE-A-PALOOZA”, a cool stamping event. We’ll have treats, free make & takes and more. Specials available all week as well as the following events:

Saturday, July 11, 12:00 pm to 2:00 pm - A-MUSE-A-PALOOZA Celebration and Make & Take
Saturday, July 11, 2:00 pm to 4:00 pm - A-MUSE-A-PALOOZA I: Sweet and Sparkly Holiday Cards
Saturday, July 15, 6:30 pm to 8:30 pm - A-MUSE-A-PALOOZA II: Simply Elegant Holiday Cards

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: A-Muse-a-polooza: Make and Take (FREE)
